author: pquerna
msg: Update for connection setup API changes.

author: pquerna
msg: Change connection setup to include creation of both the input and output buckets
at the same time, as this makes SSL Buckets on the connection level much easier to
* serf.h: Change typedef for the connection setup callback.
(serf_connection_t): Add ostream and ostream_tail to keep track of the
(write_to_connection): Create output buckets on demand, and chain
the output of a request bucket into the output tail.
* test/{serf_get,test_util}.c: Update connection setup callbacks to the new API.

author: pquerna
msg: (serf_bucket_ssl_encrypt_create): Don't create the pending bucket here, since it is unconditionally created in init now.

author: pquerna
msg: (ssl_init_context): Setup pending buckets on init, rather than after the encryt bucket is created later, as OpenSSL can do a BIO write before we create the encryting bucket.
